bytecode

Class NEG

  • java.lang.Object
    • bytecode.Bytecode
      • bytecode.NonBranchingBytecode
        • bytecode.SequentialBytecode
          • bytecode.NonCallingSequentialBytecode
            • bytecode.NEG
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    NonCallingBytecode

    public class NEG
extends NonCallingSequentialBytecode
    A bytecode that negates the top element of the stack. It works on numerical values as well as on Boolean values.

    ..., value -> ..., negation of value
    Author:
    Fausto Spoto

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      NEG(BooleanType type)
      Constructs a bytecode that negates the Boolean top element of the stack
      NEG(NumericalType type)
      Constructs a bytecode that negates the numerical top element of the stack.

    • Method Detail

      • getType

        public Type getType()
        Yields the type of the value that is negated by this bytecode. This is either the Boolean type or a numerical type.
        Returns:
        the type of the value that is negated by this bytecode

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Overrides:
        toString in class Bytecode

      • generateJavaBytecode

        public org.apache.bcel.generic.InstructionList generateJavaBytecode(JavaClassGenerator classGen)
        Generates the Java bytecode corresponding to this Kitten bytecode. Namely, it generates an ineg Java bytecode if type is int, an fneg Java bytecode if type is float and the code
        ifeq after
        iconst 0
        goto end
        after: iconst 1
        end: nop
        if type is boolean, since in the Java bytecode the integer constant 0 is used for false and 1 is used for true.
        Specified by:
        generateJavaBytecode in class NonBranchingBytecode
        Parameters:
        classGen - the Java class generator to be used for this generation
        Returns:
        the Java ineg or similar bytecode, if type is the corresponding numerical type, or the sequence seen above if type is boolean
